claim: the romaji title regatta~kimi to ita eien~ have the fewest episode of 9 in total
resp:

2. Find the row in the table that corresponds to this romaji title. In this case, it's the 9th row as the romaji title is located in the 9th row.
3. Check the episodes column for the corresponding row. The number of episodes for 'regatta~kimi to ita eien~' is 9.
4. Compare this number with the total episode count for all shows. To do this, add up the number of episodes for each show. In this table, there are 10 shows in total, and their total number of episodes are 11 (sapuri), 12 (fushin no toki ~woman wars~, kekkon dekinai otoko, hanayome wa yakudoshi!, my☆boss my☆hero), 12 (花嫁は厄年ッ!, caとお呼びっ!), 10 (タイヨウのうた), and 9 (レガッタ～君といた永遠～, shimokita sundays). The total episodes are 72.
5. Compare the number of episodes for 'regatta~kimi to ita eien~' with the total number of episodes. Since 'regatta~kimi to ita eien~' has 9 episodes and the total number of episodes is 72, 'regatta~kimi to ita eien~' has fewer episodes than any other show in this table.
